## Extremes Report  

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
if (length(author)!=0) {
  cat('\n**Author:**', author[[1]], '\n')
}
```

**Created:**  `r Sys.time()`

**Location:**  `r getValue(ts,'locationNumber',required=TRUE)` `r getValue(ts,'locationName',required=TRUE)`

**Type:** `r getValue(ts,'locationType')` 

**Agency:** `r getValue(ts,'locationAgency')`  |   **State Code:** `r getValue(ts,'locationState')`  |   **County Code:** `r getValue(ts,'locationCounty')`  

**Latitude:** `r getValue(ts,'locationLat')`  |   **Longitude:** `r getValue(ts,'locationLon')` `r getValue(ts,'locationDatum')` 

**Drainage Area:**`r getValue(ts,'locationDrainArea')`  |   **Contributing Drainage Area:**`r getValue(ts,'locationContDrainArea')` 

**Datum:** `r getValue(ts,'locationDatum')`

**Date Processed:** `r getValue(ts,'processedTimestamp')`
   
**Inputs:** `r getValue(ts,'inputDataDescriptions1')`, `r getValue(ts,'inputDataDescriptions2')`, `r getValue(ts,'inputDataDescriptions3')`
   
**Provisional Data From** `r getInput(ts, 'startDate')` to `r getInput(ts, 'endDate')`

***
   
Maximum for period, based on 365 equivalent days of record. 
   
```{r,echo=FALSE,result='asis',comment=NA}
tbl <- extremesTable(ts)
```
